version_description:
• New elements.
• Improved Night Mode.
• Minor bug fixes.

Whoops! In the last update we forgot to add new elements...
We fix this with this one. Silly us!

• 10 new elements.
• Improved Italian and Swedish translations.
Possible fix for the black/white screen issue.
Fix for the 'black/white screen' bug in the landscape orientation.
Safer and more convenient login system with all your saves waiting for you where you left off.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Content update.
Fixed the night mode bug causing the screen to be white.
Little Alchemy 2 is now out!

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Content update.
Fixed the night mode bug causing the screen to be white.
Little Alchemy 2 is now out!
